name: PetFeeder
0:
”Alexa ask Pet Feeder to feed the dog”
”Alexa ask Pet Feeder for a status update”
”Alexa ask Pet Feeder for the last feed time”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pet feeder
des:
To get an account and view instructions on how to build a smart Pet Feeder go to http://bit.ly/2r0XZ8R

Once you have that you will be able to check when they were last fed, how much food they have left, and ask Alexa to feed them for you. Requires Raspberry Pi or similar product to run (see link above for instructions)
